name: Ninjas VS Zombies v1.0
description:
My First Game made in UNITY. Please don't judge too much I'm not that good. Most especially, enjoy the game! Right now this is only playable on Laptops and Desktops. 

💻🖥️

CONTROLS:

Right and Left Arrow Keys to Move the Character

Left-Control to Attack

Space to Jump

More projects coming soon...

CREDITS:

Most of the ASSETS used here were downloaded from the site below:
